question: What are my options from Pennie if I don't qualify for disability benefits?
text:
What are my options from Pennie if I don't qualify for disability benefits?
          
        
If you have a disability, don't qualify for disability benefits, and need health coverage, you can apply for coverage on Pennie.
If you don't qualify for Medicaid based on your disability, you have 2 more options for health coverage through Pennie:


You may qualify for Medicaid based on your income and family size.


You may qualify to enroll in a health plan through Pennie with 
premium tax credits
 and other savings that make coverage more affordable. This will depend on your household size and income.


Important:
 Insurers offering coverage through Pennie can't deny coverage or charge you more based on your answers to questions about your disability.
